text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: Well then everyone, as we once again pray for the continued success of the Mejiro family, please enjoy today's New Year's party.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Alright! Let's enjoy this party to the fullest, McQueen! Should I start with sushi?! Or maybe crab?! I can't decide!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Right now, I'm wondering why you're even here in the first place. This is the Mejiro Family's New Year's party, you know.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Aw, don't be such a stiff! We're teammates that have exchanged sports drinks― which basically makes us like family!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: C'mon, before all that fresh seafood escapes back to the deep, let's go capture them with these nets we call stomachs!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have no idea what you even mean…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Happy New Year, McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ryan and Dober, Happy New Year. I look forward to working with you this year, too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yeah, likewise. Let's all do our best this year too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Last year, Dober finished with a G1 victory, so she'll have momentum going in to this one. I've been hearing rumors too so, I have high expectations.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you're really popular aren't you? As another member of the Mejiro family, it makes me happy too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I-it's not like I wanted to be popular or anything…! I just entered races that I wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Besides, if we're talking about high expectations, isn't there someone else we should be talking about?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, I saw her a little earlier but…

text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: Bright-ojousama, it's almost time for your speech, so please make your way to the stage.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: …Speech?

text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: About your achievements from last year! I spoke with you about this just a short while ago!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmm～…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: …Ah, by speech you meant giving a speech. Yes, I understand～

text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: I'm begging you～, please～…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Oh my, Ryan-oneesama. And McQueen-sama and Dober too, how do you do～?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: As usual, Ryan gets the oneesama treatment I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ahaha… well, I did look after her a lot when we were younger.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Bright, your [Spring Tenno Sho] victory was truly magnificent. And it seems you've won the URA award as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: The Tenno Sho is a race inexorably linked to the Mejiro family. I feel a deep connection to it as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: All of this, is due to Ryan-oneesama encouraging me on as a fellow team member. And so I offer my deepest gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: In Classic grade you had a string of unfortunate races, too. When you started getting results in Senior grade, it really made me happy.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: But just like this, this year let's keep aiming together for even bigger titles!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …But this year, it'll probably be somewhat difficult to get good results, I think.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The "Golden Generation"… is it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Yeah, this year they're moving up to Senior grade so there will definitely be plenty of chances to compete against them, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmm～…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: No matter who my opponent is, I will just do what it is that I must.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Even with the feelings from all these regrettable defeats, I've finally reached the pinnacle. I will not easily hand over my spot.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: …That's why, I will, without a doubt, meet those expectations. With consecutive victories at the [Spring Tenno Sho].

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: To the Mejiro family, the Tenno Sho are special races. To win them consecutively would be an achievement as remarkable as McQueen's.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, Bright may look like this, but she's actually quite a stubborn one, you know. After she's decided to win, she'll definitely win.

text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: Aaah, Bright-ojousama! You're still here?! It's almost time for your speech!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: …Speech?

text_block_list.name: Party MC
text_block_list.text: Not again～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Bright's Spring goal is the [Spring Tenno Sho] is it…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong, McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No… I suppose, that was to be expected.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: God, Buddha, and Shiraoki-sama! I pray that this year will be a year filled with great accomplishments!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …and, that the sweets I eat after meals won't make me gain weight…!
As the year begins, Special Week now becomes a part of the Senior class.
To celebrate the beginning of a new chapter, together with the members of , we're here for our first shrine visit of the New Year.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Everyone, sorry for making you wait! I've thoroughly had my prayers heard!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It seemed like you were praying pretty hard there. …By the way, who's Shiraoki-sama?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Seems like Fukukitaru's been influencing you…
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.
You shouldn't rely only on prayers though. You, yourself, need to properly put in the effort too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Of course, even in training I'll be putting in a lot more effort than before!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: After all, taking first place in a race is not something that's easy, I've been made to reeeeeally understand that…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …You've had a bunch of really close races lately, too.
After winning the [Derby], Special Week had continued in to the fall races with momentum, however―

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She's pulling away, she's pulling away! Seiun Sky is escaping! Finally Special Week is coming from the outside! But, it's Seiun Sky!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Seiun Sky, in the [Kikka Sho] now crosses the goal in first place!! Her time is― an astonishing 3:03.2! Amazing, it's a world record!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The "Derby Uma Musume" Special Week finishes 3 lengths behind in 2nd place!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: El Condor, it's El Condor! Air Groove and Special Week are catching up but, it's El Condor Pasa!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Classic grade Uma Musume El Condor Pasa, among this group of champions in the [Japan Cup], scores a dazzling victory!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Her contemporary, Special Week, was unable to catch her on the straight and finished 3rd!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sei-chan and El-chan were both really amazing…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: For Spe-san who won the [Derby] to not be able to easily win, everyone in the "Golden Generation" is really strong, aren't they…?
On top of that, this year she'll be entering the Senior grade.
It won't be just her usual rivals, so that you aren't left behind by the older and younger generations, let's put in the effort!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!
Even if her defeats continue, Special Week will stay positive and continue to work hard. The passion for her dream, even in the New Year, remains unchanged.
…is something wrong, Suzuka?
…is something wrong, Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… No, not really…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's all well and good that she's Senior class now, but have you decided on what Spe's Spring goal might be?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, I've also been wondering about that! Trainer-san, what do you think?
Truthfully, I think Spe's abilities are really high. Specifically, I want to take full advantage of her stamina that allows for long spurts.
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].
That's why I was thinking of making Spe's Spring goal the [Spring Tenno Sho].

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: [Spring Tenno Sho]…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, that sounds good! I want to see Spe-chan running in the [Spring Tenno Sho] too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Since our team has a bunch of experienced champions, they can teach you some tips for the race!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: McQueen-chan and Rice-san, both of them were really cool when they won～…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! I've looked up to them ever since!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: E-ehehe…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: If there's anything Rice can do, she'll help out. Spe-san, let's do our best together.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much～! Of course, I look forward to it!
Well then, let's go check out the food stalls. Today it'll be my treat.
Enjoy it to your heart's content, and let's work hard this year too!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Aim for "Victory at the Tenno Sho"! Aim for "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"～!
Saying that, Special Week raised her hand in the air.
Her dream still hadn't taken shape yet, but still I felt that I could see her taking hold of that dream.
